ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Nerfs....
ygData.msgSnippet: i was talking to a guy at work, and this is what i predicted, 20 mana per pulse instead of 5.  i just hope the level was not changed.  maybe time to put those
ygData.messageBody:
i was talking to a guy at work, and this is what i predicted, 20 mana per
pulse instead of 5. i just hope the level was not changed. maybe time to
put those carnal pauldrons back on instead of crested. the selo's nerf is a
joke though, we are supposed to be the fastest damn class =/

Shada

> Copied from thread : Bards got NERFED!! plus some other spell changes.
>
> Bewitching Bravura got its mana quadrupled in
> cost and maybe
> its max limit changed (hard to tell)
>
> That was to be expected but Selo's
> Accelandro and Selo's
> Song of Travel both got capped at 66% haste now...which is
> SLOWER than Spirit
> of Scale. Actually its not that much or a nerf and more of an
> insult heh.
